articles.title: Slice of life "fishing RPG" Moonglow Bay will join Xbox Game Pass and Xbox Game Pass PC - TrueAchievements
articles.description: Moonglow Bay, described as a slice of life "fishing RPG," was revealed at the Xbox Indie Showcase. It will be launch for Xbox Series X|S and Xbox One and will join Xbox Game Pass and Xbox Game Pass for PC.
